Name: Step_001
TutorialTextCN: 首先，让我们放置一级火箭的主体结构。抓取一级火箭筒体，将其放置在地面装配点上。
TutorialTextEN: First let's place the first stage main body. Grab the first stage body and place it on the ground socket.

Name: Step_002
TutorialTextCN: 现在安装主发动机。这是火箭最重要的部件之一，负责提供主要推力。
TutorialTextEN: Now install the main engine. This is one of the most important components providing primary thrust.

Name: Step_003
TutorialTextCN: 接下来安装涡轮泵。它负责以高压将燃料输送到发动机。
TutorialTextEN: Next install the turbo pump. It delivers fuel to the engine at high pressure.

Name: Step_004
TutorialTextCN: 安装液氧舱。液氧是火箭燃料的氧化剂，温度极低为-183°C。
TutorialTextEN: Install the LOX tank. Liquid oxygen is the oxidizer at extremely low temperature of -183°C.

Name: Step_005
TutorialTextCN: 安装燃料舱。它储存液氢或煤油，与液氧混合燃烧产生推力。
TutorialTextEN: Install the fuel tank. It stores liquid hydrogen or kerosene to burn with LOX.

Name: Step_006
TutorialTextCN: 安装级间段，它连接一级和二级火箭，并在一级分离后保护二级发动机。
TutorialTextEN: Install the interstage section connecting stages and protecting second stage engine.

Name: Step_007
TutorialTextCN: 现在安装二级火箭主体。二级火箭在一级分离后继续推进，将载荷送入轨道。
TutorialTextEN: Now install the second stage body. It continues propulsion after first stage separation.

Name: Step_008
TutorialTextCN: 为二级火箭安装发动机。虽然它比主发动机小，但在真空中效率更高。
TutorialTextEN: Install second stage engine. Though smaller it's more efficient in vacuum.

Name: Step_009
TutorialTextCN: 安装整流罩左半部分。整流罩在大气层内保护载荷免受空气动力学压力。
TutorialTextEN: Install left fairing half. It protects payload from aerodynamic pressure in atmosphere.

Name: Step_010
TutorialTextCN: 最后，安装整流罩右半部分，完成火箭装配！准备发射！
TutorialTextEN: Finally install right fairing half and complete the rocket assembly! Ready for launch!
